tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
All the Doctors at Tooth Avenue are extremely helpful and understanding. In my case, my ceramic braces treatment was halted, since my previous treatment was going on outside of Mumbai. I enquired about the same at several places (5 to be exact) and got no results, until I discovered Tooth Avenue, after which I never needed to look anymore.
Dr. Shaili Shah is in charge of the treatment, who is an A1 individual that knows Her profession very well. I can positively say that I trust Dr. Shaili, and Tooth Avenue for all their work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is so amazing . Friendly , makes you feel comfortable and has perfect solutions for your various issues about wearing braces . She is available at all times for any teeth related concerns - apart from orthodontics. ************ *** **** ************ ** ****** * *********  , treatment , attitude & value-for-money

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Shaili explained the invisalign process in detail. My case is complicated as I had already undergone a metal braces process, a decade ago. I did not want any of my teeth to get extracted again.Dr Shaili was very patient and answered my queries well.  I had arrived half an hour early and despite that, she did not make me wait.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Mohit and Dr Shaili who run this centre are thorough professionals who are experts at their craft. They are friendly dentists who will go out of their way to make the patients feel comfortable and at home. The attention to detail is what sets them apart. They will be thorough with their examination before they recommend any sort of treatment. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a good dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Dr Mohit and Dr Shaili are the most friendly dentists who are very skilled at their work and honest to their profession. They explained the issue and also guided with the best possible solution along with the costs involved. 

I got dental implants and root canal done and the same was done with patience and care and the whole treatment was painless or with minimal pain 

I would recommend them to my friends and family

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Shailiy is an amazing doctor....super at her work,so patient,she explained the entire procedure of the treatment so well,easily approachable,very neat and good at her work,more then that my child was v comfortable with her treatment ***** **** ******* ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Shaili is very friendly and gentle person and at the same time highly professional too.
She is very cheerful and makes the patient feel very comfortable. She is confident in her work and provides detailed explanation of the treatment. I m really glad to be visiting her and look forward to seeing her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was very happy with the options given..I chose the removable transparent braces over the fixed braces because of the superior comfort and no food restrictions.. 
I highly recommend Dr. Shaili Shah.. She is perfect.. Thank you so Much doctor..
I feel great.. easy to get appointments and super flexible.. very professional and friendly at the same time..

review: Dr. Shaili is an amazing doctor! She listens very well and is incredibly knowledgeable. I'm so happy to have found her. Highly recommended for anyone looking for dental work! My teeth look great only after a few short months.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Shaili is a super dentist, she gave me confidence that the treatment she had recommended would help me have a great smile n I am very satisfied with the results. She is very comforting and explains things in a simplified way which helps to gauge the results. I would definitely recommend Dr Shaili for any Ortho treatment.
